extension.searchTitle: To combat the rise of prenatal opioid abuse and neonatal abstinence syndrome.;Protecting Our Infants Act of 2015;H.R. 1462 (RH)

titleInfo.title: To combat the rise of prenatal opioid abuse and neonatal abstinence syndrome.

extension.officialTitle: To combat the rise of prenatal opioid abuse and neonatal abstinence syndrome.
extension.action: Ms. Clark of Massachusetts (for herself and Mr. Stivers) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

Additional sponsors: Mr. Barr, Mr. Hastings, Mr. Israel, Mr. Keating, Ms. Meng, Ms. Moore, Ms. Tsongas, Mr. Yarmuth, Mrs. Lawrence, Mr. McGovern, Mr. Newhouse, Mr. Jenkins of West Virginia, Mr. Tonko, Mr. Cartwright, Mr. Kennedy, Mrs. Bustos, Mr. Lance, Mrs. Comstock, Ms. Castor of Florida, Mr. Turner, Mr. Moulton, Mr. Cohen, Mr. Mooney of West Virginia, Mr. Rogers of Kentucky, Mr. Lynch, Mr. Cramer, Mr. Harper, Mr. DeSaulnier, Mrs. Brooks of Indiana, Mr. Hanna, Mr. Collins of New York, Mr. Grijalva, Mr. Larson of Connecticut, Mr. Mullin, Mr. Peters, Mr. Dold, Mrs. Beatty, Mr. Amodei, Ms. Kuster, Mr. Guthrie, Ms. DelBene, Mr. Hultgren, Mr. Heck of Nevada, Mr. Young of Alaska, Mr. McCaul, Mr. Bishop of Georgia, Mr. Cicilline, Mr. Welch, Mr. Doggett, Mr. Brady of Pennsylvania, Mr. Hinojosa, Mr. Pierluisi, Mrs. Black, Ms. Stefanik, Mr. Ted Lieu of California, Mr. Higgins, Mr. Levin, Mrs. Dingell, Mr. Lucas, Ms. Wasserman Schultz, Mr. Whitfield, Mr. Perlmutter, Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois, Mr. Swalwell of California, Ms. Slaughter, Ms. Clarke of New York, Mr. Roe of Tennessee, Mr. Young of Iowa, Ms. Pingree, Ms. Schakowsky, Mr. Jolly, Mr. Tiberi, Mr. Cooper, Mr. Capuano, Mr. Duncan of Tennessee, Mr. Neal, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Mr. Bilirakis, Mr. Young of Indiana, Mr. Sean Patrick Maloney of New York, Mr. Cárdenas, Mr. Loebsack, Ms. Matsui, Mr. Kilmer, Ms. Kaptur, Mr. Ryan of Ohio, Mr. Johnson of Ohio, Mrs. Napolitano, Mr. Joyce, Ms. Brownley of California, Ms. Esty, Mr. Messer, Ms. DeLauro, Mr. Costello of Pennsylvania, Ms. Fudge, Ms. Sinema, Ms. Herrera Beutler, and Mr. MacArthur
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
